overview: The documentary is a portrait of of the oldest video library in the world and his owner. Eckhard "Ecki" Baum opened the „Video Film-Shop“ in Kassel (Germany) in the summer of 1975. It all began in „Wolfsanger“ with the sale and exchange of Super8 films, that soon lured to a bigger shop and some daring methods.
tagline: The oldest video library in the world.
title: Ecki´s World
